participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, enjoys trying new things and spending time with family.
participant_1.background: I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes. I've spent way too much money on gummy worms. I have tried 35 different types of beer in my lifetime. I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible. My favorite season is duck hunting season.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Curious and artistic, loves culture and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to. I enjoy going to museums. I am Wiccan, but haven't told them. I like to smell my own farts. I spend a good deal of time on social media.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I love going to museums and exploring new cities.
That's cool! What's your favorite museum you've been to?
I really liked the Museum of Modern Art in NYC. It was so interesting to see all the different types of art.
I've been to the MoMA too! It's really cool. I also like the British Museum in London.
Oh, I've never been to the British Museum. I'll have to add that to my list!
You should! It's one of the biggest museums in the world and it has a lot of cool stuff.
Awesome! I'm definitely going to check it out.
Have you ever been to any museums in Canada?
No, I've never been to Canada. I've always wanted to go though!
You should! Canada is a beautiful country with a lot to offer.
I'll definitely have to plan a trip there soon.
